Row bind list of data frames wrapper to one-function do.call rbind over a lapply list

Source: R/Misc_tools.R
rbind_lapply.Rd

Row bind list of data frames wrapper to one-function do.call rbind over a lapply list

rbind_lapply(X, FUN)

Arguments

X

a list. See details lapply.
FUN

a function to subset data frames (or data tables). See details lapply.

Value

a row bound data frame

Examples

set.seed(42)

X<- lapply(1:3,function(i) list(int = 42,df = data.frame(x = runif(10,0,1),y = runif(10,0,1))))
rbind_lapply(X,function(x) x$df)

#>             x           y
#> 1  0.91480604 0.457741776
#> 2  0.93707541 0.719112252
